Title: Directs the center for agricultural medicine and health to create silo safety warning placards and a silo safety advocacy program; and relates to funding of such placards and advocacy program
Summary: Directs the center for agricultural medicine and health to design and create silo safety warning placards and a silo safety advocacy program; creates a silo safety fund and state income tax gift option for funding of such placards and advocacy program.
LawCode: Add ยง3909, Pub Health L; add ยง92-kk, St Fin L; add ยง630-l, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating silo safety warning placards and a silo safety advocacy program; and to amend the state finance law and the tax law, in relation to funding of such placards and advocacy program
